I

ImageBlocker - Class in com.hac.Blocker
The ImageBlocker class extends BlockerDecorator and implements the BlockerCommand interface, providing a URL blocking mechanism by checking for the presence of image content in the response header.
ImageBlocker(BlockerCommand) - Constructor for class com.hac.Blocker.ImageBlocker
Constructor for the ImageBlocker class.
INVALID_COMMAND - Static variable in class com.hac.Exception.ErrorMessages
Represents an error message that occurs when an invalid command is entered in the program.
INVALID_OPTION - Static variable in class com.hac.Exception.ErrorMessages
Represents an error message that occurs when an invalid option is selected in the program.
INVALID_URL - Static variable in class com.hac.Exception.ErrorMessages
Represents an error message that occurs when an invalid URL is entered in the program.

IOManager - Class in com.hac.IO
The IOManager class is a singleton utility class responsible for handling file I/O operations such as reading, writing, and appending to files, as well as streaming content from an HttpURLConnection to a file.
